name: Enroach
description:
Summary: A fast-paced platformer where you use your parkour skills to traverse the level and gather all the coins.

Genres: 2D, Plaformer, Speedrunning

Playermode: Singleplayer

Controls: Keyboard only, ARROW keys to move, SPACE to jump

Platform: PC/Mac

Coded Language: C# in Unity 

Inspiration: Celeste
